name: DescribeImage
description:
This operation generates a description of an image in human readable language with complete sentences. The description is based on a collection of content tags, which are also returned by the operation. More than one description can be generated for each image. Descriptions are ordered by their confidence score. Descriptions may include results from celebrity and landmark domain models, if applicable.
Two input methods are supported -- (1) Uploading an image or (2) specifying an image URL.
A successful response will be returned in JSON. If the request failed, the response will contain an error code and a message to help understand what went wrong.

maxCandidates.description: Maximum number of candidate descriptions to be returned.  The default is 1.

language.description: The desired language for output generation. If this parameter is not specified, the default value is "en".Supported languages:en - English, Default. es - Spanish, ja - Japanese, pt - Portuguese, zh - Simplified Chinese.

descriptionExclude.description: Turn off specified domain models when generating the description.

body.description: A JSON document with a URL pointing to the image that is to be analyzed.

$block: A collection of content tags, along with a list of captions sorted by confidence level, and image metadata.

$ul: **description**: A collection of content tags, along with a list of captions sorted by confidence level, and image metadata.
**captions**: A list of captions, sorted by confidence level.
**requestId**: Id of the REST API request.

$block: Details about the API request error.

$ul: **message**: A message explaining the error reported by the service.
